title: december 10: a nobel in absentia
description:
Today on 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about a Nobel Prize awarded in absentia. She also revisits a recent release. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
